reviewText: It was interesting.  It does start right in the middle of everything.  There's a little bit of introduction into what's happening but if you don't know a little bit of history it may be a little confusing.  Nothing that Wikipedia can't fix though..

Too soap-opery for such an important historic figure. His writings on the rights of man, adapted by the United Nations 130 years later are not even mencioned, nor his continued devotion to his priestly calling. Such a historical giant deserves a better biopic
Great. Shedding light on a little taught (in US) bit of history.  Thank you.
Arrived in excellent conditions and the projection was excellent.  The story also is wonderful
